name: CYBER HUNT (UncannyMario)
description:
You shoot robot birds as they try to attack you. Your score increases the longer you survive.

Controls:

Key A / Left Arrow - Move Left

Key R / Right Arrow - Move Right

Key Space - Shoot Bullets

Credits:

All the programming and music are made by me (@UncannyMario01).

All the sprite art is made by my brother (@OneHourofSleep).
